Instruction: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) and lightly grease a large baking sheet.
Knead the dough gently on a floured surface until it is smooth, about 5 minutes.
Brush the tops with a little milk. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 12 to 15 minutes.

Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until they are well risen and golden brown. Take them out of the oven and let them cool. Slice each piece in half lengthwise, then place them back on the baking sheet. Turn off the oven and return the rusks to the warm oven to dry out for about 15 minutes.
